movies.title: Legends from the Sky
movies.plot: A Native American Veteran, burdened by survivor's guilt after a disastrous military tour, is forced to search for his missing grandfather after his ancestral land is mysteriously taken over by an unknown federal organization.
movies.simplePlot: A Native American Veteran, burdened by survivor's guilt after a disastrous military tour, is forced to search for his missing grandfather after his ancestral land is mysteriously taken over by an unknown federal organization.

biography.bio: Edsel Pete is an actor, known for Legends from the Sky (2015), Sicario (2015) and The Space Between Us (2017).
biography.name: Edsel Pete

biography.bio: Chris Robinson was born on November 5, 1938 in West Palm Beach, Florida, USA. He is an actor and director, known for Another World (1964), 12 O'Clock High (1964) and Savannah Smiles (1982). He has been married to Jacquie Shane since April 24, 2011. He was previously married to Rhonda and Sandy Tennant.
biography.name: Chris Robinson

biography.bio: Ernest Tsosie III was born in Arizona, USA. He is an actor, known for A Thief of Time (2004), Pete & Cleo (2010) and 5th World (2005).
biography.name: Ernest Tsosie III

biography.bio: James Bilagody is an actor, known for Legends from the Sky (2015), More Than Frybread (2011) and Blue Gap Boy'z (2008).
biography.name: James Bilagody

biography.bio: Thomas H. Begay is an actor, known for Legends from the Sky (2015).
biography.name: Thomas H. Begay

biography.bio: Cale Epps is an actor and cinematographer, known for Just the Vampire Hunter (2015), Fallout (2010) and Legends from the Sky (2015).
biography.name: Cale Epps

biography.bio: Drew Moore is known for his work on Amorality (2014), Legends from the Sky (2015) and The Padded Room (2016).
biography.name: Drew Moore

biography.bio: Wayne Charles Baker is an actor, known for Pathfinder (2007), Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee (2007) and Legends from the Sky (2015).
biography.name: Wayne Charles Baker

biography.bio: Derek Solorsano was born November 23rd 1981. He was raised by his single mother and half-older brother and sister in a house on the south-side of Chicago, Illinois. As a child he never had much but always dreamed of being a talented actor by participating in talent shows and mimicking movies in front of his family. It wasn't until after he served in the military and explored different career opportunities that he moved to Phoenix, Arizona and started pursuing acting as a career. He became an extra in the movie Kingdom and it was at that moment that he realized acting was his calling. "This is why God put me here, to entertain," says Derek. After intense training at the school of hard knocks, he started to land supporting and starring roles in independent and student films. Those films gave him a taste of what it's like to be the focus in front of the camera rather than in the background. These films made him hungry for growth in acting, which has been his inspiration to succeed. His career recently took off when he booked a supporting role in the film 2 Guns starring Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg.
biography.name: Derek Solorsano

biography.bio: Timothy Odom is an actor, known for Legends from the Sky (2015), The Voice That Was Louder Than Before (2016) and Charlie (2015).
biography.name: Timothy Odom

biography.bio: Jon J. Gonzalez is known for his work on Woman Walks Ahead (2017), Cowboys & Aliens (2011) and Legends from the Sky (2015).
biography.name: Jon J. Gonzalez

biography.bio: Dempsey E. Chapito is an actor, known for Legends from the Sky (2015), More Than Frybread (2011) and Monster Slayer (2015).
biography.name: Dempsey E. Chapito

biography.bio: Venita Yawakie-Gauna is an actress, known for Buffalo in the Room, Legends from the Sky (2015) and Between Friends (2013).
biography.name: Venita Yawakie-Gauna

biography.bio: Tommy Joy is an actor and writer, known for Opal (2015), Legends from the Sky (2015) and A Chairs of the Heart (2015).
biography.name: Tommy Joy
